thread.title: This Hilarious Animal Shelter Commercial Is the Best Thing You’ll See Today
thread.title_full: This Hilarious Animal Shelter Commercial Is the Best Thing You’ll See Today

author: Abby Heugel
title: This Hilarious Animal Shelter Commercial Is the Best Thing You’ll See Today
text: Over 3 million people just like you 'Like' us » Like it? Share it! 415 Shares Most local commercials are cheesy and lame with awkward business men shouting about "Wheels and Deals!" but this one from Fur Kids , Georgia's largest no-kill animal shelter, is basically winning the hearts of the Internet. via: YouTube There are a lot of incredible moments in this three minute gem, including a woman pretending to be a wacky waving inflatable tube man.
